name: sswrd

body.origin:

-| diffsc(hs0, cword(c0))
-| diffsc(hs0, cword(c1))
-| diffsw(hs0, wss(c0, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 → Word(c0)⊆ Word(c1))
⊣ (c0 ⊆ c1 →(hs0 ∈ Word(c0)→ hs0 ∈ Word(c1)))
⊣ d(hs0, Word(c0))
⊣ d(hs0, Word(c1))
⊣ d(hs0, c0 ⊆ c1)
